title: The Climb
writer: Ludovic Bernard, Nadir Dendoune, Olivier Ducray
short_cast: Ahmed Sylla, Alice Belaïdi, Kevin Razy, Nicolas Wanczycki, Waly Dia, Umesh Tamang
cast: Ahmed Sylla, Alice Belaïdi, Kevin Razy, Nicolas Wanczycki, Waly Dia, Umesh Tamang
genre: Romantic Comedies, French, Movies Based on Real Life, Movies Based on Books, Action & Adventure, Comedies, Dramas, Romantic Movies

desc: A young Senegalese-French man from humble roots sets out to climb Mount Everest to impress the woman he loves -- and slowly becomes a media sensation.
